Headline: #146 Inner Drive/Michigan Express and # 151 Sheridan Temporary Southbound Reroute near Roscoe/Aldine
ShortDescription: Southbound 146 Inner Drive/Michigan Express and 151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Inner Lake Shore Dr, Addison, Broadway, Sheridan and Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #146 Inner Drive/Michigan Express and # 151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Inner Lake Shore Dr, Addison, Broadway, Sheridan and Belmont due to street blockage near Roscoe/Aldine

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Dempster-Skokie-bound Yellow Line Service Delayed at Howard
ShortDescription: Dempster-Skokie-bound Yellow Line trains are standing at Howard due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Dempster-Skokie-bound Yellow Line trains are standing at Howard due to signal problems. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
